book.title: Rackspace Cloud Block Storage Release Notes

annotation.remark: Copyright details are filled in by the template.

abstract.para: This document is intended for software developers who are interested in developing applications using the Rackspace Cloud Block Storage Application Programming Interface (API).

revdescription.para: Published the Cloud Block Storage Getting Started Guide for the API. The example requests in this guide use cURL.
Added the version and tenant ID to URIs in the API operations chapter of the Cloud Block Storage Developer Guide.
Added the availability_zone and metadata request parameter descriptions to the create volume operation description in the API operations chapter.

listitem.para: Added the list volumes (detailed) operation description to the Volumes section of the API operations chapter.
Added the list snapshots (detailed) operation description to the Snapshots section of the API operations chapter.

revdescription.para: Updated the show snapshot details operation description to mention the progress indicator, os-extended-snapshot-attributes:progress, and show it in the example responses.

listitem.para: Added the volume cloning capability that allows you to create a new Cloud Block Storage volume from an existing volume by adding the source_volid parameter to the create volume operation.
Updated the instructions for locating the API key, tenant ID, and account number in the Cloud Control Panel in the Authentication section.
Added RBAC.
Updated the service access endpoints.
Added the update volume operation.

Updated the size parameter description for create volume operation because the way creating a volume from a snapshot changed. The API for creating a volume from a snapshot was ignoring the size parameter and was creating a volume the same size as the snapshot. Now the volume size must be greater than the snapshot size.
Updated the create snapshot operation description adding information about snapshot progress. The progress is visible in the os-extended-snapshot-attributes:progress field of the snapshot.
Moved the definitions of terms formally in the Concepts section to the glossary and renamed the Concepts section to Terminology.

preface.title: Preface
preface.para: This document describes new features and changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

For detailed information about the Cloud Block Storage API, see the following guides at http://docs.rackspace.com/:
Cloud Block Storage Getting Started Guide
Cloud Block Storage Developer Guide
Support for Cloud Block Storage is available 24x7x365 via phone or chat, or you can also file a ticket.
You can also provide feedback by using the Product Feedback forum.
Rackspace welcomes your comments, feedback, and bug reports.

chapter.title: Document change history
chapter.para: This version of the release notes replaces and obsoletes all earlier versions. The most recent changes are described in the following table:

chapter.title: August 9, 2013
chapter.para: This release contains new features and documentation changes for the Cloud Block Storage API.

listitem.para: Added the update volume operation.
For the create snapshot operation, added snapshot progress. The progress is visible in the "os-extended-snapshot-attributes:progress" field of the snapshot.

For the create volume operation, changed the way creating a volume from a snapshot works. The API for creating a volume from a snapshot was ignoring the size parameter and was creating a volume the same size as the snapshot. Now the volume size must be greater than the snapshot size.
Moved the definitions of terms formally in the Concepts section to the Glossary and renamed the Concepts section to Terminology.
